Performance:
September 1978: The League of the 47 Ronin

Production: September 1978

Play: The League of the 47 Ronin (仮名手本忠臣蔵)

– Click image to view.

Scenes:

The Helmet Identification at Tsurugaoka (鶴が岡兜改め / Tsurugaoka kabuto aratame)

The Love Poem (恋歌 / Koika)

The Cutting of the Pine Branch (松切り / Matsukiri)

The Bribing of Moronao (大手下馬先進物　 / Ōte gebasaki shinmotsu)

Okaru Delivers the Letter Case (Kaoyo's Poem) (おかる文使い / Koshimoto Okaru fumizukai)

The Attack in the Palace (殿中刃傷 / Denchū ninjō)

The Back Gate (裏門 / Uramon)

The Suicide of Hangan (塩谷館判官切腹 / Enya yakata Hangan seppuku)

The Evacuation (霞ヶ関城明渡し / Kasumigaseki shiro akewatashi)

The Encounter on the Yamazaki Highway (山崎街道出合 / Yamazaki kaidō deai)

The Shooting in the Dark (山崎街道二つ玉 / Yamazaki kaidō futatsudama)

The Selling of Okaru (お軽身売り / Okaru miuri)

Kampei's Suicide (勘平腹切 / Kampei harakiri)

The Ichiriki Tea House in Gion (祇園一力茶屋 / Gion Ichiriki chaya (jaya))

The Bridal Journey (道行旅路嫁入り / Michiyuki tabiji no yomeiri)

The Snowball (雪転かし / Yuki kokashi)

Yuranosuke's House at Yamashina (山科閑居 / Yamashina kankyo)

The Hanamizubashi Bridge (花水橋引揚 / Hanamizubashi hikiage)

Characters:

Tadayoshi (Ashikaga Tadayoshi / 足利直義)

Moronao (Kōno Moronō (Moronao) / 高師直)

Hangan (Enya Hangan / 塩谷判官)

Wakasanosuke (Momonoi Wakasanosuke / 桃井若狭助)

Kaoyo (Kaoyo Gozen / 顔世御前)

Bannai (Sagisaka Bannai / 鷺坂伴内)

Honzo (Kakogawa Honzō / 加古川本蔵)

Kampei (Hayano Kanpei / 早野勘平)

Okaru (Koshimoto (Yūjo, Nyōbō, Musume) Okaru / 腰元(遊女,女房, 娘)おかる)

Chinsai (Sadō Chinsai / 茶道珍才)

Rikiya (Ōboshi Rikiya / 大星力弥)
